About us >

CONNECTING THE WORLD TO VIDEO

ShowHeroes is a global leader in digital video content, tech, and advertising solutions.

Who we are

ShowHeroes helps publishers create the best content for their audiences while generating ad revenues within editorial environments. Advertisers reach new consumers in brand-safe environments with engaging formats and sustainable, reliable results.

The company was founded by Ilhan Zengin, Mario Tiedemann, and Dennis Kirschner in 2016 with headquarters in Berlin and employs more than 350 people worldwide in 28 strategic hubs throughout Europe, the Nordics, LATAM, and the US.

What we do

Our global lineup of professional, video-centric publisher solutions include ShowHeroes Monetize, a video licensing and monetization platform, and ShowHeroes Play, a full-featured Online Video Platform (OVP), geared towards large, professional media brands looking for video asset and content management tools.

For advertisers, ShowHeroes offers personalized, brand-safe solutions at scale through our in-house, engaging video formats paired with a broad variety of targeting options including contextual targeting powered by Semantic Hero, our AI-driven, semantic-matching technology. Brands take advantage of incremental audiences and global reach while gaining access to over 150k premium video clips and custom production.
